CheckTitle: Check if DocumentDB cluster storage is encrypted.
Description: Check if DocumentDB cluster storage is encrypted.
Risk: Ensure that encryption of data at rest is enabled for your Amazon DocumentDB (with MongoDB compatibility) database clusters for additional data security and regulatory compliance.

Code.CLI: aws docdb create-db-cluster --db-cluster-identifier sample-cluster --port 27017 --engine docdb --master-username yourMasterUsername --master-user-password yourMasterPassword --storage-encrypted

Recommendation.Text: Enable Encryption. Use a CMK where possible. It will provide additional management and privacy benefits.
